This dashboard is created using R.
The following packages are used:

* [tidyverse](https://www.tidyverse.org/) for the data wrangling.
* [shiny](https://shiny.posit.com/) for the dashboard.
* [eurostat](https://ropengov.github.io/eurostat/index.html) for the data.
* [ggplot2](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/) for beautiful plots.
* [plotly](https://plotly.com/r/) for interactive plots.
* [waiter](https://waiter.john-coene.com/#/) for the loading screen.
* [scales](https://scales.r-lib.org/) for the formatting of the plots.
* [RcolorBrewer](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/RColorBrewer/index.html) for the color palettes.


Color palette is choosen from [ColorBrewer](https://colorbrewer2.org/#type=sequential&scheme=BuGn&n=3). All colors are colorblind safe.


Powered by [RStudio](https://rstudio.com/).
